{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つく|o1=り}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|作る|tr=tsukuru||to make; to build; to work the land, to grow something}}, itself from {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つくる}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation 1====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|つくり|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

=====Noun=====
{{ja-noun|つくり}}

# the [[workmanship]] or [[make]] of something, how something is made
#: {{ja-usex|'''作り'''のいい家具|'''つくり''' の い.い かぐ|furniture of good '''make''' or '''workmanship''', well-'''made''' furniture}}

#: {{ja-usex|派手な'''作り'''は嫌いだ。|^はで な '''つくり''' は きらい だ。|I dislike colorful / flashy '''dress'''.}}
# a [[helping]] or [[serving]] of fresh [[sashimi]], usually several [[slice]]s
#: {{ja-usex|鮭の'''作り'''を楽しみにしている。|^しゃけ の '''つくり''' を たのしみ に して いる。|I'm looking forward to a '''helping''' of salmon sashimi.}}

=====Usage notes=====
More often spelled with the [[okurigana]], as {{m|ja|作り}}.
